ExtendedSection.Title: Configuration of the default template context provider

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The default context provider is configured via the file templatecontexts.json in the folder /system/shared/. In the file, you can configure the devices available for preview. The devices are grouped by contexts "desktop", "tablet" and "mobile". This groups are fix for the default context provider.
